monsterDetails.lightShiftAbilityDescription: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.
monsterDetails.darkShiftAbilityDescription: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Aerial Strike
skills.description: 4 x 90% (360%) physical damage (wind) applies Sidekick (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Aerial Strike Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 115% (460%) physical damage (wind) applies Sidekick & Might (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Agility
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Attack Plus
skills.description: Improve Attack rating by 1 (Increases Attack by 26)

skills.name: Avalanche
skills.description: 1 x 160% physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +30%

skills.name: Avalanche Lvl 2
skills.description: 1 x 210% physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +40%

skills.name: Avalanche Lvl 3
skills.description: 2 x 130% (260%) physical damage (water) Hits all enemies, Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Barricade
skills.description: Every shield that comes from this Monster (active and passive) has a 4% chance to apply Barrier (Buff).

skills.name: Blacksmithing
skills.description: Aura: Increases Defense, Health, Mana, Mana Regeneration, Critical Chance and Critical Damage from equipment by 15% for allied Monsters.

skills.name: Buffing Shield
skills.description: When applying a Buff, also apply a Shield equal to 30% of this Monster's Defense.

skills.name: Cascade
skills.description: The power of every consecutive hit during an ability is increased by 5% continuously. (For a 4 hit attack: +0%, +5%, +10%, +15%)

skills.name: Chilling Wind
skills.description: 4 x 40% (160%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 2
skills.description: 5 x 40% (200%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 55% (275%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 4
skills.description: 6 x 55% (330%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Chilling Wind Lvl 5
skills.description: 6 x 75% (450%) magical damage (wind) Applies Chill (Debuff)

skills.name: Copy Shield
skills.description: When Shielding yourself, also apply 20% of that Shield to allies.

skills.name: Crit Chance Plus
skills.description: +5% Critical Chance

skills.name: Crit Damage Plus
skills.description: +15% Critical Damage

skills.name: Critical Freeze
skills.description: The first critical hit of an ability applies Chill (Debuff).

skills.name: Critical Hybridization
skills.description: The first critical hit of a physical attack triggers an additional hit equal to 60% of Magic value and vice versa.

skills.name: Defense Plus
skills.description: Improve Defense rating by 1 (Increases Defense by 36)

skills.name: Dragon Mastery
skills.description: Aura: Actions by Dragons apply a Debuff to all enemies based on element. Fire: Burn, Ice: Chill, Wind: Shock, Earth: Poison, Neutral: Armor Break, Support: Weakness.

skills.name: Dragonskin
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Dragonskin Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party Applies Barrier (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Dragonskin Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Spellshield & Barrier (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Equipment Mastery
skills.description: Allows the Monster to equip an additional accessory.

skills.name: Evasion
skills.description: Critical Chance also increases the chance to dodge enemy hits by 20% of the value.

skills.name: Exploit Party
skills.description: Aura: Whenever a Monster in the party exploits an enemy's weakness with an attack, it gains a random Buff and shields by 5% of its Max Health.

skills.name: Flash Freeze
skills.description: Trigger an additional 100% damage hit when applying Chill (Debuff) with an attack.

skills.name: Full Aerial Assault
skills.description: 2 x 165% (330%) physical damage (wind) Hits all enemies Applies Sidekick (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Gale
skills.description: 1 x 165% magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 100% (200%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Gale Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 85% (255%) magical damage (wind) Hits all enemies

skills.name: Health Plus
skills.description: Improve Health rating by 1 (Increases Health by 332)

skills.name: Heroism
skills.description: Deals 2% increased damage for every Buff on this Monster.

skills.name: Ice Breath
skills.description: 5 x 115% (575%) magical damage (water) Removes 2 Buffs from target - applies 2 random Buffs to itself

skills.name: Iceclaws
skills.description: 2 x 95% (190%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Iceclaws Lvl 2
skills.description: 2 x 120% (240%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Iceclaws Lvl 3
skills.description: 3 x 95% (285%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Iceclaws Lvl 4
skills.description: 3 x 120% (360%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Iceclaws Lvl 5
skills.description: 4 x 110% (440%) physical damage (water) Critical Damage +50%

skills.name: Magic Plus
skills.description: Improve Magic rating by 1 (Increases Magic by 26)

skills.name: Mana Focus
skills.description: Mana and Mana Regeneration values from equipment increased by 25%.

skills.name: Mana Overload
skills.description: Increase Attack and Magic by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Plus
skills.description: Improve Mana rating by 1 (Increases Mana by 21. Increases Mana Regeneration by 10)

skills.name: Mana Proc
skills.description: Every attack triggers an additional hit equal to 50% of Max Mana.

skills.name: Mana Shielding
skills.description: When attacking an enemy, generate a Shield equal to 15% of Max Mana for each hit.

skills.name: Mana Stability
skills.description: Increase Defense by 15% of this Monster's Max Mana.

skills.name: Multi Barrier
skills.description: Aura: Barrier (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Chill
skills.description: Aura: Chill (Debuff) can be stacked two additional times on enemies. Additional stacks are only half as strong.

skills.name: Multi Sidekick
skills.description: Aura: Sidekick (Buff) can be stacked two additional times. Additional stacks have only a 50% chance to trigger.

skills.name: Physical Weakness
skills.description: Physical damage increased by 50%

skills.name: Quicken
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to a random Monster.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 2
skills.description: Applies Agility (Buff) to whole party Applies Sidekick (Buff) to two random Monsters.

skills.name: Quicken Lvl 3
skills.description: Applies Agility & Sidekick (Buffs) to whole party

skills.name: Shared Barrier
skills.description: Whenever this Monster gains Barrier (Buff), another random Monster in the party also gains Barrier.

skills.name: Sidekick Support
skills.description: Unique Aura: Healing, Shield and Buffing actions are now also affected by Sidekick Buff - triggering additional heals (40% magic), shields (40% defense) or buffs.

skills.name: Snow Veil
skills.description: 3 x 100% (300%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 2
skills.description: 4 x 95% (380%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Snow Veil Lvl 3
skills.description: 5 x 95% (475%) magical damage (water) applies Barrier (Buff) to itself

skills.name: Spellshield
skills.description: Applies Spellshield (Buff) to whole party

skills.name: Sub Zero
skills.description: Unique Aura: Chill causes enemies affected by it to take 10% increased damage.

skills.name: Typhoon Cut
skills.description: 6 x 90% (540%) physical damage (wind) applies Glory, Sidekick & Agility (Buffs) to itself

skills.name: Water Resistance
skills.description: Water damage reduced by 50%

skills.name: Wind Resistance
skills.description: Wind damage reduced by 50%
